Module paths
Package edu.ntnu.idatt2001.paths.controllers

Class LoadGameController

java.lang.Object
edu.ntnu.idatt2001.paths.controllers.LoadGameController
public class LoadGameController extends Object
The type Load game controller. This class is responsible for loading games. It is used to show the user a list of saved games, and to load the selected game.
Version:
1.3 20.05.2023
Author:
Helle R. and Sander S.

  • Method Details

    • getSavedGames

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<File> getSavedGames(String fileType)
      Returns a list of saved games. It takes in a file type, and returns a list of all the files of that type.
      Parameters:
      fileType - the file type
      Returns:
      the saved games as a list of File

    • getBrokenLinksString

      public String getBrokenLinksString(File file)
      Helper method to get the broken links as a concatenated string. It takes in a file, and returns a string of all the broken links in that file.
      Parameters:
      file - the file to get the broken links from
      Returns:
      the broken links as a string

    • createTableView

      public javafx.scene.control.TableView<File> createTableView(ScreenController screenController)
      Helper method to create a table view. It takes in a screen controller, and returns a table view of all the saved games.
      Parameters:
      screenController - the screen controller
      Returns:
      the table view of saved games
